name: Shop Floor Andon Assistant
tagline: Intelligent support for production line issues and escalations
overview: The Shop Floor Andon Assistant provides intelligent support when operators pull the andon cord or flag issues. It helps diagnose problems, suggests solutions from the knowledge base, routes escalations to the right experts, and tracks resolution for continuous improvement.
whatItDoes: Guides operators through initial problem diagnosis
Suggests solutions from historical issue resolution database
Routes escalations to appropriate support resources
Tracks issue resolution times and outcomes
prompts: The torque gun is giving intermittent errors
I'm seeing a gap in this weld that looks out of spec
The fixture isn't aligning correctly on this variant
Who should I call for this equipment issue?
Has anyone seen this problem before?

impact.description: Faster issue resolution with better support

guardrails: Assistive onlyâ€”supervisors and experts make resolution decisions
Safety issues always escalate to human supervision immediately
Does not authorize production to continue without human approval
Suggestions based on historical data, not autonomous diagnosis
All resolutions tracked for learning and improvement
whatsNext: Developing concept with manufacturing excellence team. Defining integration with existing andon systems.
